coded_answer.p: I am writing in reply to your letter about the internationinternational student conference.

The hotel which we have reserved for your group is the Palace Hotel. It is not far from our college, taking 20 minutes by car. It would be a good idea to take a taxi from the hotel to the college because the total number of members ofin your group areis 4 and a taxi fare would not be expensive. There is a taxi rank opposite the hotel.

Regarding the end-of-conference party on Thursday, it starts at 7 p.m. in the garden of the college. You can wear either casual dressesdress or fancy onesdress because we haveare having a fancy-dress competition and the raffleprize is a bottle of French champaignchampagne.

On Friday afternoon, it has set to be asome free time. Therefore, you can go shopping in the town centre, which is near the college. Many beautiful and traditional souvenirs can be found there. The other suggestion is going to the flower market, wherewhich is very famous for tourists because it covers 2 acres and there are plenty of flowers to buy. Moreover, it is the biggest flower market in this area.
I look forward to meeting you soon and hope you have a safe journey.

There are many sources of light in this world, such as sunlight, moonlight, and candle lightcandlelight. Some of them are natural whereas the others are not. Owing to an increasing demand offor light, for more activities, the natural source is not adequate. ThereTherefore, electric light has inventedwas invented.
Nowadays, the electric light has been becominghas become part of our lives, especially during the night. Whatever we do at night, we need the electric light.

Have you ever imagedimagined how this world would be if there was no electric light? It must have beenmade a big impact on industry, agriculture and our lifestyle. Think about when the electricity in your house got a short circuitcircuited. DoDid you feel uncomfortable? Could you do anything much without light?

In addition, the electric light is the manuscript of other electric equipmentsequipment and they hashave become an important part of our life, too. I think we should be grateful that we have got the electric light for comforting our lifestyle.
